__e: But whatever we find, I'll have more questions for both of you.
Captain, he may be talking again, but that doesn't mean he's ready to be interrogated.
No, no. We'll get the most deception leakage from these firemen... if they're interviewed by someone that they respect.
Your wife is watching this entire interview.
I think our time would be better spent chatting with Mr. Ford.
Do you think they might be just bringing us in for questioning?
Once we find them, we'll bring them in for questioning.
I'm sorry but we're going to have to take you to the precinct for more questioning.
Why didn't you speak of this at the inquest?
Uh, but you never reported this in your first interview.
I just don't understand your line of questioning.
